robolemur (lol)
About a month ago my grandson's nose was broken in three places at school recess by a wayward field hockey stick.Â Â It Bled all over the place.Â Â My daughter asked me to take him to Urgent Care and dropped him Off at my place.Â Â You won't believe this, but all that blood was gone!Â His nose looked a little crooked and he needed surgery to fix it and I'm happy to report he's as handsome as ever!!!
So don't believe everything you see in a grainy security video.Â
